summary: Android app “Voice UPI Alert” (Android 10+) that detects credited UPI/bank transactions from SMS and notifications, announces via offline Android TTS (works with screen off), shows a simple modern UI with totals and recent transactions, deduplicates events, and includes a Buy Me a Coffee UPI intent button; no paid SDKs/Firebase/servers.
architectural_notes: Use Android NotificationListenerService for UPI app notifications and SMS receiver/Telephony APIs for SMS (with runtime permissions and default SMS app constraints considered).
Implement offline parsing/deduplication layer: normalize events from SMS/notifications and suppress duplicates within a time/amount window.
Use Android TTS for announcements; run via foreground service/background-friendly approach to ensure speaking works with screen off (Android 10+).
Store transactions locally on-device only (e.g., Room DB) to compute “today total” and show last 5 transactions.
Implement UPI deep link/intent for “Buy Me a Coffee” with provided UPI ID and prefilled note/amount optional.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal app icon with a microphone and rupee symbol in a clean monochrome style (app-icon.dim_512x512.png)
- Simple wordmark logo reading “Voice UPI Alert” in a modern sans-serif style (logo.dim_1200x300.png)

existing_features.title: Implement a simple, modern home screen UI for “Voice UPI Alert” with: (1) total money received today, (2) last 5 transactions list, (3) a large Voice ON/OFF toggle, (4) dark mode support, and (5) large readable typography.

Add a permissions/explanation-style screen (web-appropriate) that clearly explains what would be needed for SMS and notification detection on Android, and that this web build cannot request SMS/notification access; require the user to acknowledge before proceeding to the home screen.

Implement transaction capture via manual input (paste/import text) and offline parsing logic to detect *credit* transactions and extract: amount in INR, sender name (when available), date/time (when available), and source label (e.g., “GPay”, “PhonePe”, “Paytm”, “Amazon Pay”, “Bank SMS”) based on heuristics; store parsed transactions locally in the app state.

Implement voice announcement using browser-native Text-To-Speech (SpeechSynthesis) when a new credit transaction is added and Voice is ON, with an English announcement like: “Money credited. Rupees 200 received in your account.” Provide a way to test the voice output from the UI.
Add a “Buy Me a Coffee ☕” button at the bottom of the home screen that opens a UPI payment intent URL using the provided UPI ID: taranseetharaman273@oksbi.
Create a coherent, clean visual theme (not blue/purple) and apply it consistently across the app (layout, spacing, typography, component styling) while keeping the UI minimal and modern.

new_feature_requests.summary: Detect incoming credit transactions from SMS and UPI app notifications (GPay/PhonePe/Paytm/Amazon Pay + bank SMS) and extract amount, sender, datetime, and source app.
Voice announcement via Android Text-To-Speech for credited money; must work even when screen is off; toggleable on/off.
Simple modern UI: total received today, last 5 transactions list, big voice ON/OFF toggle, dark mode, large fonts.
Notification listener + duplicate prevention between SMS and notifications; filter only successful credit messages.
“Buy Me a Coffee ☕” button that opens a UPI intent to taranseetharaman273@oksbi; no ads or forced login.
Privacy & safety: all processing offline, no server upload; permission explanation screen before requesting SMS/notification access.
Technical constraints: Android-only, free libraries only, Android 10+, battery-optimized background service, no Firebase/paid APIs.
Provide deliverables: app structure, logic flow, permission handling approach, sample regex for ₹ amount detection, and UI layout description.
